The sword pulled Razor Claw off balance but he did not let go. "What 
demonic force is this?" He was paying attention to the sword when Ice 
forced him into the wall. He dropped his sword upon impact. Pinned 
against the wall he threw his knee up trying to catch her in the jaw.

Lunarpine stepped forward grabbing the sword and tossed it aside so 
Razor Claw wouldn't be able to recover it. "Hit him again Ice." He 
was really getting into watching the fight but he still wished he was 
in there instead of her.

Veratis played the part of a typical scientist taking notes as the 
fight went on. He wanted to see what she was capable of in a fight, 
he was deffinitely getting his moneys worth and then some.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She focused on the sword, using her Telekenesis, tried to pull the 
> sword out of his hands. She wanted to fight him claw and claw.  She 
> changed into full polar bear form and charges at him. Trying to ram 
> him into the wall.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "I am a warrior, nobody said anything about honor." he raised his 
> > sword and moved forward to stand at eye level with the halfling 
> > before him. "Let's do this so you can die young." he placed both 
> > hands on his sword awaiting her challenge.
> >
